title: Warm Clothes for Dhaka's Slum Dwellers
description: Donate warm clothes to help slum dwellers in Dhaka during the winter season.

description: Join us in distributing blankets to homeless people in Dhaka to keep them warm.

description: Support rural communities in Chattogram with essential winter clothing.

description: Provide warmth to low-income families in Chattogram during the harsh winter.

description: Help tea garden workers in Sylhet stay warm this winter by donating sweaters.

description: Join our efforts to distribute winter clothes to rural families in Sylhet.

title: Keep Barisal Warm: A Winter Appeal
description: Barisal's vulnerable groups need your help to stay warm this winter. Every donation counts.
